source.name: National Nanotechnology Initiative Investments by Agency and Program Component Area
source.description: Data represents National Nanotechnology Initiative investments by agency and program component area (PCA) from FY 2001 through FY 2010 (requested). While this data has been available as part of the NNI's annual supplements to the President's Budget, the funding data presented here is more accessible and readily available for analysis by users to assess trends and examine investment allocations over the 10-year history of the NNI. The cumulative NNI investment of nearly $12 billion in nanotechnology research and development continues to advance our understanding of the unique phenomena and processes that occur at the nanoscale and to leverage that knowledge to speed innovation in high-impact opportunity areas such as energy, security, and medicine.
